Text: Cancel the next card in queue
Reverse the effect of the next Basic Maneuver (Reversing an item gaining Basic switches which side it goes to)
Double the effect of the next Basic Maneuver
Repeat the previous card's effect including all modifiers
Swap the next 2 cards in queue

All Wealth {^Wealth} gains are increased by 1 for the rest of the turn
All Control {^Control} gains are increased by 1 for the rest of the turn
All Strength {^Strength} losses are increased by 1 for the rest of the turn
All Wealth {^Wealth} losses are increased by 1 for the rest of the turn
